body_html:
I have this same crash and backtrace when trying to run the tutorial in my pip-installed pytorch. Except I have ubuntu 16.04, python 3.5.2, and cuda 8.0.

Reinstalling with and running in the anaconda environment works fine. Guess there probably is some conflict with my own installed MKL version then.
body_text:
I have this same crash and backtrace when trying to run the tutorial in my pip-installed pytorch. Except I have ubuntu 16.04, python 3.5.2, and cuda 8.0.
Reinstalling with and running in the anaconda environment works fine. Guess there probably is some conflict with my own installed MKL version then.
body:
I have this same crash and backtrace when trying to run the tutorial in my pip-installed pytorch. Except I have ubuntu 16.04, python 3.5.2, and cuda 8.0.

Reinstalling with and running in the anaconda environment works fine. Guess there probably is some conflict with my own installed MKL version then.
